meanings.definition: The state or quality of being lucky.
meanings.sent1: Her luckiness in finding a four-leaf clover made her smile.
meanings.sent2: His luckiness in winning the raffle was unexpected.
meanings.sent3: The cat's luckiness in catching the mouse was quite amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The luckiness of the sun breaking through the clouds brought a sense of joy.
meanings.sent5: The luckiness of the horseshoe hanging above the door was believed to bring good fortune.

meanings.definition: The occurrence of events by chance in a beneficial way.
meanings.sent1: The luckiness of finding a parking spot right in front of the store was a pleasant surprise.
meanings.sent2: The team's luckiness in scoring the winning goal was celebrated by all.
meanings.sent3: The luckiness of the rain stopping just in time for the outdoor wedding was quite fortunate.
meanings.sent4: The luckiness of the wind carrying the kite higher and higher amazed the children.
meanings.sent5: The luckiness of stumbling upon a rare flower in the forest was a stroke of good fortune.
